name: 3D Icebreaker Parking - Arctic Boat Driving & Simulation Ship Racing Games
name_original: 3D Icebreaker Parking - Arctic Boat Driving & Simulation Ship Racing Games
description:
** ALL ICEBREAKERS UNLOCKED! **
** SUPER HD 3D GRAPHICS! **

Get ready for set sail for the arctic! In this sub zero boat driving and parking game, you get to take command of an arctic icebreaker!

Your job is to make it through each level without breaking too much ice. You'll have to not only try to find the best path that requires the least amount of ice breaking, but you'll also have to watch out for the live whales swimming around you. If you crash into a whale, game over!

How far will you make it through these frozen waters?

FEATURES

- All icebreaker ships unlocked!
- Real ice breaking!!
- Lots of obstacles including whales that swim around.
- Realistic 3D graphics.
- 10 levels to master!
- Multiple camera angles.
- Multiple steering options.
